thread.title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X to be launched on February 14th
thread.title_full: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X to be launched on February 14th

title: Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X to be launched on February 14th
text:
Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X to be launched on February 14th Xiaomi Redmi Note 4X to be launched on February 14th By February 6, 2017 “The Redmi Note 4X will be an upgraded variant of the Redmi Note 4” 
Earlier this year, an unknown Xiaomi smartphone, believed to be the Redmi 4X, was leaked in live images . In December, the phone was also spotted on the Chinese certification agency TENAA . Now, the company in a post on Weibo has teased the launch the Redmi Note 4X on this Valentine’s Day i.e. February 14th. 
The post reveals that the brand will be introducing a new celebrity spokesperson on February 8th, who will bring a special gift on Valentine’s Day. 
As per the listing on TENAA last month, the Redmi Note 4X will be an upgraded variant of the Redmi Note 4 ( review ). The phone will offer a metal unibody design and a fingerprint sensor at the back. It will come with 4GB of RAM, 32GB and 64GB variants, a MediaTek Helio X20 SoC and a 4,100mAh battery. The live images of the device revealed that it will have a fingerprint sensor embedded into its home button. 
Reports suggest that there will also be a Snapdragon 653-powered variant of the Redmi Note 4X for global markets. We will have official details regarding the device soon, so watch this space.
